es.esi.techlab.bluebeetooth.implementations.MiBand

Class MiBand

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.esi.techlab.bluebeetooth.implementations.MiBand.MiBand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BluetoothListener

    public final class MiBand
extends java.lang.Object
implements BluetoothListener
    MiBand class implements the observable pattern in order of communicate its with the mobile phone.
    See Also:
